subSubSection.paragraph: Helochares Sauteri d'Orchymont , 1943a: 6. Type locality: China (Taiwan).

Paratype
male (IRSN), Ta-maon Id. (II), 92-87. A. d'Orchymont det.: Helochares (Hydrobaticus) sauteri m., coll. A. d'Orchymont .

China (Fujian, Guangdong, Guizhou, Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Taiwan, Zhejiang). New for Hunan.
This species occurs in mud, or under root of waterside grass of pool or slow stream. It can occasionally be collected in mud without aquatic grass, and by light trap.
